results.name: a(n) = floor(sqrt(2)*n)-2*floor(n/sqrt(2)).
link: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Benoit Cloitre, Fractal walk starting at (0,0) with step of unit length turning right if a(n)=0 and left otherwise for n=1 up to 10^6
formula: a(n) = floor(n*sqrt(2)) mod 2. - _T. D. Noe_, Oct 11 2006
